title: Judge blocks Trump administration from ending legal protections for Haitians
shortDescription: The ruling says the termination of TPS is "null, void and of no legal effect" and will not impact the work authorization of Haitian immigrants.

title: Trump's new border barrier rises like a 'wall' in the Rio Grande
shortDescription: The string of orange buoys mimics an earlier effort by Texas Gov. Greg Abbott to wall off the Rio Grande.

title: Bill and Hillary Clinton agree to House depositions on Jeffrey Epstein
shortDescription: Former President Bill Clinton and wife, former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton, agreed to testify to a House committee about Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Trump won't demolish Kennedy Center as part of $200 million rebuild
shortDescription: "I’m not ripping it down," Trump said of the Kennedy Center. "I’ll be using the steel. So we’re using the structure. We’re using some of the marble."

title: Trump says Trevor Noah is 'terrible'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump dissed Trevor Noah after the comedian took a jab at him during the Grammys.

title: Trump lowers India tariffs in new deal
shortDescription: President Donald Trump cuts tariffs on India as Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi agrees to boost U.S. oil purchases.

title: Trump admin backs Catholic schools in Supreme Court LGBTQ+ case
shortDescription: The Trump administration wants the Supreme Court to let Catholic preschools receive public funds even if they don’t admit students from LGBTQ+ families.

title: Trump says Republicans should 'nationalize' and 'take over' elections
shortDescription: President Trump said Republicans should try to "nationalize" elections as he keeps leveling unfounded claims of voter fraud in the 2020 election.

title: What to know about pending House contempt votes for Clintons
shortDescription: Here is what to know about the pending House votes on whether to hold Bill and Hillary Clinton in criminal contempt for defying subpoenas.

title: Trump threatens Trevor Noah over Epstein joke
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is threatening to sue Trevor Noah after he made a joke at the Grammys about the president visiting Jeffrey Epstein's island.

title: Trump trades oil for tariffs in deal with India
shortDescription: Donald Trump said he was lowering the tariff on India as part of a deal for the country to stop buying Russian oil and increase purchases from the United States.

title: Georgia county to challenge legality of Trump admin seizing ballots
shortDescription: Fulton County plans to ask a court to force the Trump administration to return Georgia ballots seized in a probe tied to the 2020 election.

title: Did Trump go to Epstein's island? About Trevor Noah's joke at the Grammys
shortDescription: Donald Trump has been named in the latest Jeffrey Epstein file update. Grammys host Trevor Noah joked about his visits to the island, did he go?

title: Trump responds to Iran leader's threat of regional war if US attacks
shortDescription: Trump been ratcheting up threats against Iran over the past several weeks, urging a nuclear deal and increasing U.S military presence in the region.

title: Trump threatens to sue Trevor Noah over Epstein island joke at Grammys
shortDescription: President Trump threatened to sue Grammys host Trevor Noah over a joke he made about Trump and Bill Clinton visiting Jeffrey Epstein's island.

title: Trump to renovate the Trump-Kennedy Center
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he will close the Trump-Kennedy Center for renovations that will take two years.

title: Trump Kennedy Center will close for two years, Trump says
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said the center needs to close for two years for renovations, then will return with a "Grand Reopening."
